identity.name: Amel Fit Coach
identity.design_philosophy: Organic Luxury. Warmth over sterility. Emotion over trends.

typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for all major headings to establish elegance. Use Manrope for UI elements and long text for readability. Use Caveat sparingly for 'personal notes' from the coach.

usage.background: Use #FFFCF8 as the main page background for a warm, premium feel.
usage.text: Use #1A1A1A for primary text. Avoid pure black.
usage.buttons: Primary buttons should be #1A1A1A (Soft Black) with White text. Secondary buttons #F2EFE9 (Beige) with Black text.
usage.gradients: Avoid gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a very subtle noise texture to the background if possible to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 for sticky headers and floating controls.

buttons.style: h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 hover:border-accent/50 hover:shadow-hover group

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-input bg-transparent px-4 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary transition-all

hero.alt: Woman stretching in a calm beige environment

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise.
Ensure all text has high contrast (APCA standards).
Use 'Playfair Display' for headings to create the 'Vogue' fitness look.
Images should have a subtle overlay if text is placed on top.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend for Amel Fit Coach. Follow the color palette strictly. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Ensure the 'My Account' and 'Course Detail' pages feel premium and personal. Use the 'Playfair Display' font for all H1-H3 headings.
